title: Bird Colors
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 41 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: What colors can birds be? Bird Colors uses photographs to depict the many colors found on these feathered, flying creatures. Students have the opportunity to identify the main idea and details as well as ask and answer questions about birds. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: bird, blue, brown, colors, gray, green, orange, pink, purple, red, yellow
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
wordWork: Concept Words                : Recognize, write, and use color words
